signature: Transformer<I, O> switchTransformer(Predicate<? super I>[], Transformer<? super I, ? extends O>[], Transformer<? super I, ? extends O>)

enhanced_by.reason: The setupPredicatesAndTransformers method initializes the predicates and transformers map, which is essential for the switchTransformer method to function correctly.
The evaluatePredicates method evaluates a list of predicates against an input, similar to how switchTransformer evaluates predicates to determine which transformer to use.

enhanced_by.method_name: applyTransformers(Transformer<? super I, ? extends O>[], I)
enhanced_by.reason: The applyTransformers method applies a list of transformers to an input, which is analogous to the functionality of switchTransformer in selecting and applying the appropriate transformer.
